content:
1. A SaaS platform for creating and managing design assets and brand guidelines for large companies and organizations. This would allow designers to easily access and use approved assets, and for managers to easily track and update brand guidelines.
2. A SaaS platform for creating and sharing interactive design prototypes. This would allow designers to easily create clickable, interactive mockups of their designs, which could then be shared and tested with clients and stakeholders.
3. A SaaS tool for automating the process of creating and testing various design variations. This would allow designers to quickly and easily test different design options, and would use machine learning to optimize the design based on user engagement and other metrics.
